Using CodePush with Wix react-native-navigation

02 Aug 2017

As React Native grows in popularity, so do its third party modules. One complication that I’ve encountered while using wix’s react-native-navigation is that it isn’t super obvious how to integrate it with Microsoft codepush.

Complex Nesting Forms in Rails

03 Aug 2017

Rails offers a way to create, edit and destroy models belonging to a parent model. I’m going to show you how to implement this in your Rails app.

How to fix Xcode Validation Error: “Your binary is not optimized for iPhone 5"

07 Aug 2017

I recently ran into this error while archiving my app for upload to iTunes Connect. For these fixes, you will need to have your launch screen images. You can either generate them at appicon.build (an awesome website, by the way) or use a black screen.

Publishing a free Ghost blog with Heroku, Namecheap, and Cloudflare

28 Jul 2018

In this article, I assume you already have a domain name registered, but if not, I prefer Namecheap for registering domains as it has generally low prices and an interface which is easy enough to use. If you haven’t yet, go buy a domain and come back once you’re done.
